job title: Data and Analytics Engineer III Auburn Hills or Dallas
job description:
Data Scientist
The Data Scientist will leverage data to help the enterprise make more informed decisions to generate additional revenue, increase efficiencies, and reduce losses. They will be responsible for taking a project from requirement gathering phase all the way to implementation and monitoring results of the campaign.

Position Competencies
Successful incumbents have excellent customer service skills, have strong inter-personal and communication skills, strong attention to detail, drive for results, decision quality, dealing with ambiguity, and ability to multi-task and have strong organizational skills.

Responsibilities:
System Engineering

· Partner with clients and technical resources to create, design, implement and or maintain applications in the appropriate environment.

· Create estimates (when applicable) for System Design, Development, Testing and / or Implementation.

· Identify potential system issues in projects, request fulfillment and / or individual assignment.

· Understand the Infrastructure (IaaS) and Platform as a Service (PaaS) models or other models needed for role.

· Conduct testing as defined in department standards.

· Monitor system performance and troubleshoot alerts from commercial, open source and locally developed monitoring tools as required.

· Provide system failure analysis and recovery recommendations.

· Participate in Business continuity planning and testing as required.

· Perform Hardware/software configuration.

· Serve as liaison with non-technical people, operations personnel, and/or field service personnel; interact directly with business partners to negotiate solutions and implementation specifics.

· Partner with application developers to deploy and operate our systems.

· Automate and streamline operations and processes.

· Build and maintain tools for deployment, monitoring and operations.

· Troubleshoot and resolve issues in our dev, test and production environments.

· Establishes/recommends policies and procedures for system use and services.

· Responsible for good inter-personal and communication skills; capable of writing proposals and papers, acting as a vendor liaison, making presentations to customer/client audiences or making professional presentations, work closely with upper management.

Technical Consulting

· Perform technical analysis and make recommendation on small to medium initiatives with medium complexity.

· Explain technical solution to client and technical resources.

· Serve as a point of escalation for technical and general troubleshooting for small to simple incidents.

Support

· Determination and resolution of root cause behind reported problems and issues.

· Development and/or maintenance of system documentation.

· Proactive maintenance toward select systems.

· Vendor upgrades:

o Ensuring compliance with departmental standards

o Enhancements to will allow improved performance

· Participates in the design, development, testing and implementation of enhancements required to maintain business unit success.

· Utilize all appropriate departmental guidelines and processes.

· Develop / Maintain appropriate application documentation.

Master's degree or PhD from an accredited university in a quantitative filed such as statistics, operations research, computer science, econometrics, applied mathematics, engineering or related field is Preferred.

Relocation
Relocation assistance is not provided for this position.

Travel
Travel is not required for this position.

· 2 years of experience in an Analyst role

· 1 year of experience in database query using SQL and experience in data management tools

· 1 year of Large-scale data manipulation and integration experience

· 1 year of experience conducting quantitative analyses using statistical modeling and machine learning

· 2+ years of programming experience and proficiency in at least one of the following languages: R, SAS or Python

· 1 year of experience using a cloud platform like AWS (Azure is a plus)

· 1 year of experience presenting data to both technical and non-technical audiences (Power BI is a plus)

· College Degree or High School Diploma or GED and 2 years of experience

Equal Opportunity Employer Minorities/Women/Protected Veterans/Disabled
